sentences.sentence: I want none of your leavings.
That gonna make your leavings without regret and willing to do so.
sentences.translation: 更让你们走的无怨无悔，心甘情愿。

sentences.sentence: When the end of promotion, please return the present if there have leavings.
sentences.translation: 当促销结束后，如有赠品未送完应及时退还海蒂诗；
